Property01.Heading: BasicData
Property01.tooltip: Name of tha part of the blockMesh node

Property02.Heading: BasicData
Property02.tooltip: Path to tha part of the blockMesh node

Property03.Heading: BasicData
Property03.tooltip: Link a part to the blockMesh node

Property04.Heading: Block
Property04.tooltip: Numbers of cells in each direction

castellatedMesh.title: castellatedMesh
castellatedMesh.description: To switch on creation of the castellated mesh

snap.title: snap
snap.description: To switch on surface snapping stage

addLayers.title: addLayers
addLayers.description: To switch on surface layer insertion

mergeTolerance.title: mergeTolerance
mergeTolerance.description: merge tolerance as fraction of bounding box of initial mesh

locationInMesh.title: locationInMesh
locationInMesh.description: location vector inside the region to be meshed; vector must not coincide with a cell face either before or during refinement

maxLocalCells.title: maxLocalCells
maxLocalCells.description: max number of cells per processor during refinement.

minRefinementCells.title: minRefinementCells
minRefinementCells.description: if minRefinementCells bigger/equal than number of cells to be refined, surface refinement stops

nCellsBetweenLevels.title: nCellsBetweenLevels
nCellsBetweenLevels.description: number of buffer layers of cells between successive levels of refinement

resolveFeatureAngle.title: resolveFeatureAngle
resolveFeatureAngle.description: applies maximum level of refinement to cells that can see intersections whose angle exceeds resolveFeatureAngle

nSmoothPatch.title: nSmoothPatch
nSmoothPatch.description: Number of smoothing iterations along the surface

nSmoothInternal.title: nSmoothInternal
nSmoothInternal.description: Number of iterations for internal smoothing to reduce non-orthogonality at the face of refinement (effectively making the faces non-planar).

tolerance.title: tolerance
tolerance.description: Multiplied by local cell-edge length specifies region along the surface within which the points are attracted by the surface.

nRelaxIter.title: nRelaxIter
nRelaxIter.description: Number of relaxation iterations during the snapping

nFeatureSnapIter.title: nFeatureSnapIter
nFeatureSnapIter.description: Number of relaxation iterations used for snapping onto the features

implicitFeatureSnap.title: implicitFeatureSnap
implicitFeatureSnap.description: Switch turning on the implicit feature specification

explicitFeatureSnap.title: explicitFeatureSnap
explicitFeatureSnap.description: Snap mesh onto the feature lines defined in eMesh file.

multiRegionFeatureSnap.title: multiRegionFeatureSnap
multiRegionFeatureSnap.description: When using explicitFeatureSnap and this switch is on, features between multiple surfaces will be captured. This is useful for multi-region meshing where the internal mesh must conform the region geometrical boundaries

expansionRatio.title: expansionRatio
expansionRatio.description: expansion factor for layer mesh, increase in size from one layer to the next.

finalLayerThickness.title: finalLayerThickness
finalLayerThickness.description: thickness of layer furthest from the wall, usually in combination with relative sizes according to the relativeSizes entry.

minThickness.title: minThickness
minThickness.description: minimum thickness of cell layer, either relative or absolute

firstLayerThickness.title: firstLayerThickness
firstLayerThickness.description: thickness of layer nearest the wall, usually in combination with absolute sizes according to the relativeSizes entry.

thickness.title: thickness
thickness.description: total thickness of all layers of cells, usually in combination with absolute sizes according to the relativeSizes entry

featureAngle.title: featureAngle
featureAngle.description: angle above which surface is not extruded

slipFeatureAngle.title: slipFeatureAngle
slipFeatureAngle.description: At non-patched sides allow mesh to slip if extrusion direction makes angle larger than slipFeatureAngle

nLayerIter.title: nLayerIter
nLayerIter.description: overall max number of layer addition iterations

nRelaxedIter.title: nRelaxedIter
nRelaxedIter.description: max number of iterations after which the controls in the relaxed sub dictionary of meshQuality are used

nRelaxIter.title: nRelaxIter
nRelaxIter.description: maximum number of snapping relaxation iterations

nGrow.title: nGrow
nGrow.description: number of layers of connected faces that are not grown if points do not get extruded

nSmoothSurfaceNormals.title: nSmoothSurfaceNormals
nSmoothSurfaceNormals.description: number of smoothing iterations of surface normals

nSmoothNormals.title: nSmoothNormals
nSmoothNormals.description: number of smoothing iterations of interior mesh movement direction

nSmoothThickness.title: nSmoothThickness
nSmoothThickness.description: smooth layer thickness over surface patches

maxFaceThicknessRatio.title: maxFaceThicknessRatio
maxFaceThicknessRatio.description: stop layer growth on highly warped cells

maxThicknessToMedialRatio.title: maxThicknessToMedialRatio
maxThicknessToMedialRatio.description: reduce layer growth where ratio thickness to medial distance is large

minMedianAxisAngle.title: minMedianAxisAngle
minMedianAxisAngle.description: angle used to pick up medial axis points

nBufferCellsNoExtrude.title: nBufferCellsNoExtrude
nBufferCellsNoExtrude.description: create buffer region for new layer terminations

minTetQuality.title: minTetQuality
minTetQuality.description: minimum quality of tetrahedral cells from cell decomposition

errorReduction.title: errorReduction
errorReduction.description: amount to scale back displacement at error points

minFlatness.title: minFlatness
minFlatness.description: ratio of minimum projected area to actual area

relaxed.title: relaxed
relaxed.description: sub-dictionary that can include modified values for the above keyword entries to be used when nRelaxedIter is exceeded in the layer addition process

objectNameTSM.title: objectName
objectNameTSM.description: Name to use to refer to this surface

levels.title: Levels
levels.description: Enter a list of 2 numbers:  distance and refinement level (1 2)

refinementSurfaceLevelsTSM.title: refinementSurfaceLevels
refinementSurfaceLevelsTSM.description: Enter 2 numbers: refinement on the X and on the Y dimensions

objectNameTSM.title: objectName
objectNameTSM.description: Name to use to refer to this surface

levels.title: Levels
levels.description: Enter a list of 2 numbers:  distance and refinement level (1 2)

refinementSurfaceLevelsTSM.title: refinementSurfaceLevels
refinementSurfaceLevelsTSM.description: Enter 2 numbers: refinement on the X and on the Y dimensions

startFrom.description: Controls the start time of the simulation.

startTime.title: startTime
startTime.description: Start time for the simulation with startFrom startTime

stopAt.description: Controls the end time of the simulation.

endTime.title: endTime
endTime.description: End time for the simulation when stopAt endTime; is specified.

writeControl.description: Controls the timing of write output to file.

writeInterval.title: writeInterval
writeInterval.description: Scalar used in conjunction with writeControl described above.

runTimeModifiable.title: runTimeModifiable
runTimeModifiable.description: Switch for whether dictionaries, e.g. controlDict, are re-read during a simulation at the beginning of each time step, allowing the user to modify parameters during a simulation.

adjustTimeStep.title: adjustTimeStep
adjustTimeStep.description: Switch used by some solvers to adjust the time step during the simulation, usually according to maxCo.

items.description: Dictionary of functions, e.g.  probes to be loaded at run-time
List of additional libraries (on $LD_LIBRARY_PATH) to be loaded at run-time

purgeWrite.title: purgeWrite
purgeWrite.description: Integer representing a limit on the number of time directories that are stored by overwriting time directories on a cyclic basis.

writeFormat.description: Specifies the format of the data files.

writePrecision.title: writePrecision
writePrecision.description: Integer used in conjunction with writeFormat described above.

writeCompression.title: writeCompression
writeCompression.description: Switch to specify whether files are compressed with gzip

timeFormat.description: Controls the timing of write output to file.

timePrecision.title: timePrecision
timePrecision.description: Integer used in conjunction with timeFormat described above

graphFormat.description: Format for graph data written by an application.
